column2: #multiply the concentration by the dilution factor
ch4_samples <-  ggplot(data = Samples, aes(x = Sample_ID, y = CH4_Conc_ppm, fill=CH4_Flag)) +

theme_classic() + labs(x= " ", y="CO2 (ppm)", title="CO2: Green = Within Range") +
